alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 1:20PM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Northeast Highlands, and Guadalupe County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to midnight MST Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways, including I-25 from Glorieta Pass to Las Vegas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow may reduce visibility across the high peaks.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
